summary: This document is a deposit account opening application for Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas. It outlines the requirements for establishing a banking relationship, including identification verification and compliance with anti-money laundering regulations. The document emphasizes the responsibilities of account holders regarding tax obligations and the management of joint accounts.
keyFacts: The document is a deposit account opening application for Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas.
It includes requirements for identity verification to combat money laundering and terrorism financing.
Account holders must notify the bank of any changes to their personal or institutional information.
The document outlines the terms for joint accounts, including rights of withdrawal and ownership.
There are references to compliance responsibilities for non-US individuals and organizations regarding tax obligations.
